faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: How can we help you?
faq.question_1: How can I book a service on TicDrive?
faq.answer_1: Open the TicDrive app or website, enter your vehicle details and location, then select the service type and time. Booking is quick and easy.
faq.question_2: How can I add or update a payment method?
faq.answer_2: Go to your profile and tap "Payment Methods" to add or update your preferred option.
faq.question_3: Can I book a service during the weekend?
faq.answer_3: Yes, you can schedule services on any day of the week, including weekends.
faq.question_4: Can I cancel or modify a booking?
faq.answer_4: Yes, bookings can be canceled or modified at least 24 hours before the scheduled time.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.intro: Thank you for your interest in this Privacy Policy and welcome to TicDrive, our mobile application for iOS and Android (our “App”). This policy aims to inform App users about the nature, scope, and purposes of collecting and using personal data by us.

whoIsController.title: WHO IS THE DATA CONTROLLER?
whoIsController.description: A 'data controller' determines the purposes and means of processing personal data. TicDrive, Via Leonardo da Vinci, 12b, 35133 Padova PD, Italy, is the data controller. Contact us at mariancompany07@gmail.com.

whatIsPersonalData.title: WHAT IS PERSONAL DATA?
whatIsPersonalData.description: Personal Data is information that identifies a person, including name, date of birth, address, email, phone number, and IP address. Anonymous data is not identifiable.

whatIsProcessing.title: WHAT IS PROCESSING?
whatIsProcessing.description: ‘Processing’ means any operation performed with data—from collection to storage, use, and deletion.

applicableLaw.title: WHAT LAWS APPLY?
applicableLaw.description: We comply with the Italian Personal Data Protection Code, the EU GDPR, and this Privacy Policy.

legalBases.title: LEGAL BASES FOR PROCESSING
legalBases.description: We process your data based on: a) consent, b) contractual necessity, c) legal obligations, or d) legitimate interests.

collectedData.title: WHAT PERSONAL DATA DO WE COLLECT?
collectedData.description: We collect name, email, phone, password, vehicle details, location, app activity, messages, and uploaded content. We also collect technical data and use services like Firebase, Stripe, Sentry, and others. Your data helps us operate and improve the App.

locationAndDevice.title: LOCATION AND DEVICE DATA
locationAndDevice.description: We may process your location (GPS, IP) and device info (OS, model, sensors). You can manage permissions in your device settings.

thirdParties.title: THIRD-PARTY SERVICES
thirdParties.description: We use services like Stripe, Google Maps, Railway, Azure, Firebase, and Sentry. These providers may process data independently and in third countries.

otherUses.title: OTHER USES
otherUses.description: Your data is used to operate the App, provide support, improve services, and conduct marketing (if consented).

storageRetention.title: STORAGE AND RETENTION
storageRetention.description: Data is securely stored in a PostgreSQL database on Railway. It is deleted when no longer needed, unless required by law.

yourRights.title: YOUR RIGHTS
yourRights.description: You have the right to access, correct, delete, object, restrict processing, and data portability. Contact us to exercise your rights.

dataBreaches.title: DATA BREACHES
dataBreaches.description: In case of a data breach, affected users will be promptly informed, along with the corrective measures taken.

supervisoryAuthority.title: SUPERVISORY AUTHORITY
supervisoryAuthority.description: The competent authority is the Italian Data Protection Authority (Rome, Italy). We prefer resolving issues directly: contact us first.

policyChanges.title: CHANGES TO THIS POLICY
policyChanges.description: This version is effective from April 30, 2025. We’ll notify you of any changes by updating this date.
